pages.text: The Reaper armor set is a fairly expensive Armor Set in Reaped. For each piece of Reaper Armor the chance for a head to drop, with the Infernal Scythe, increases by 5%, starting from 0%. Additionally, a full set of Reaper Armor grants the wearer a speed buff as another trade off for its low protection and durability.
